ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] تَأْمُرُهُمْ [command them] أَحْلَـٰمُهُم [their minds] بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ [this] أَمْ [or] هُمْ [they] قَوْمٌۭ [(are) a people] طَاغُونَ [transgressing]
ayahs.transliteration: Am ta/muruhum ahlamuhum bihathaam hum qawmun taghoon

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] يَقُولُونَ [(do) they say] تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ [He has made it up] بَل [Nay] لَّا [not] يُؤْمِنُونَ [they believe]

ayahs.textUthmani: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ [Then let them bring] بِحَدِيثٍۢ [a statement] مِّثْلِهِۦٓ [like it] إِن [if] كَانُوا۟ [they are] صَـٰدِقِينَ [truthful]

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] خُلِقُوا۟ [they were created] مِنْ [of] غَيْرِ [nothing] شَىْءٍ [nothing] أَمْ [or] هُمُ [(are) they] ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ [the creators]
ayahs.transliteration: Am khuliqoo min ghayri shay-in am humu alkhaliqoon

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] خَلَقُوا۟ [(did) they create] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ [and the earth] بَل [Nay] لَّا [not] يُوقِنُونَ [they are certain]
ayahs.transliteration: Am khalaqoo assamawatiwal-arda bal la yooqinoon

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] عِندَهُمْ [with them] خَزَآئِنُ [(are the) treasures] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] أَمْ [or] هُمُ [(are) they] ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ [the controllers]
ayahs.transliteration: Am AAindahum khaza-inu rabbika amhumu almusaytiroon

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] لَهُمْ [for them] سُلَّمٌۭ [(is) a stairway] يَسْتَمِعُونَ [they listen] فِيهِ ۖ [therewith] فَلْيَأْتِ [Then let bring] مُسْتَمِعُهُم [their listener] بِسُلْطَـٰنٍۢ [an authority] مُّبِينٍ [clear]
ayahs.transliteration: Am lahum sullamun yastamiAAoona feehifalya/ti mustamiAAuhum bisultanin mubeen

ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] لَهُ [for Him] ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ [(are) daughters] وَلَكُمُ [while for you] ٱلْبَنُونَ [(are) sons]

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ [(do) you ask from them] أَجْرًۭا [a payment] فَهُم [so they] مِّن [from] مَّغْرَمٍۢ [a debt] مُّثْقَلُونَ [(are) overburdened]
ayahs.transliteration: Am tas-aluhum ajran fahum min maghraminmuthqaloon

ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] عِندَهُمُ [with them] ٱلْغَيْبُ [(is) the unseen] فَهُمْ [so they] يَكْتُبُونَ [write (it) down]

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] يُرِيدُونَ [(do) they intend] كَيْدًۭا ۖ [a plot] فَٱلَّذِينَ [But those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieve] هُمُ [themselves] ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ [(are in) the plot]
ayahs.transliteration: Am yureedoona kaydan fallatheenakafaroo humu almakeedoon

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] لَهُمْ [for them] إِلَـٰهٌ [a god] غَيْرُ [other than] ٱللَّهِ ۚ [Allah] سُبْحَـٰنَ [Glory be] ٱللَّهِ [(to) Allah] عَمَّا [from what] يُشْرِكُونَ [they associate (with Him)]
ayahs.transliteration: Am lahum ilahun ghayru Allahisubhana Allahi AAamma yushrikoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَإِن [And if] يَرَوْا۟ [they were to see] كِسْفًۭا [a portion] مِّنَ [from] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the sky] سَاقِطًۭا [falling] يَقُولُوا۟ [they will say] سَحَابٌۭ [Clouds] مَّرْكُومٌۭ [heaped up]
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-in yaraw kisfan mina assama-isaqitan yaqooloo sahabun markoom

ayahs.textUthmani: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَذَرْهُمْ [So leave them] حَتَّىٰ [until] يُلَـٰقُوا۟ [they meet] يَوْمَهُمُ [their Day] ٱلَّذِى [which] فِيهِ [in it] يُصْعَقُونَ [they will faint]
ayahs.transliteration: Fatharhum hatta yulaqooyawmahumu allathee feehi yusAAaqoon

ayahs.textUthmani: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(The) Day] لَا [not] يُغْنِى [will avail] عَنْهُمْ [to them] كَيْدُهُمْ [their plotting] شَيْـًۭٔا [(in) anything] وَلَا [and not] هُمْ [they] يُنصَرُونَ [will be helped]
ayahs.transliteration: Yawma la yughnee AAanhum kayduhumshay-an wala hum yunsaroon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَإِنَّ [And indeed] لِلَّذِينَ [for those who] ظَلَمُوا۟ [do wrong] عَذَابًۭا [(is) a punishment] دُونَ [before] ذَٰلِكَ [that] وَلَـٰكِنَّ [but] أَكْثَرَهُمْ [most of them] لَا [(do) not] يَعْلَمُونَ [know]
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-inna lillatheena thalamooAAathaban doona thalika walakinna aktharahumla yaAAlamoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱصْبِرْ [So be patient] لِحُكْمِ [for (the) Command] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] فَإِنَّكَ [for indeed, you] بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ [(are) in Our Eyes] وَسَبِّحْ [And glorify] بِحَمْدِ [(the) praise] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] حِينَ [when] تَقُومُ [you arise]
ayahs.transliteration: Wasbir lihukmi rabbikafa-innaka bi-aAAyunina wasabbih bihamdirabbika heena taqoom

ayahs.wordByWord: وَمِنَ [And of] ٱلَّيْلِ [the night] فَسَبِّحْهُ [glorify Him] وَإِدْبَـٰرَ [and after] ٱلنُّجُومِ [the stars]
